role_dependencies: Ensures Snap is installed on Linux systems
role_description: An Ansible role that installs Starship command prompt on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: [Starship](https://starship.rs/) is the minimal, blazing fast, and extremely customizable prompt for any shell! It shows the information you need, while staying sleek and minimal. Unlike most other prompts, it is compatible with nearly every type of terminal. If you want to retain the same look and feel across different terminals, then look no further.
